descriptionHtml:
Another arrow re-placer of mine, this is for the Daedric arrow, this will only strike the target it is aimed at. It is also a long range and fast flying arrow.
Check out the other mods you just might find what you are looking for.

Enjoy
Chuck

 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56582/]Butterfly Arrow

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54630/]Ebony Wall of Fire Arrow

author: Chuck12010
